name: Entertainment Story with Twist
description: Engaging storytelling template with a surprise twist ending for maximum engagement
template: You won't believe what happened to me {time_reference}. So I was {setting_scene} when suddenly {initial_event}. At first, I thought {initial_assumption}. But then {plot_development}. Just when I thought things couldn't get {emotion_escalation}, {major_twist}! The crazy part? {revelation}. {moral_or_lesson}. Have you ever experienced something like this? Drop your stories below!

variables.name: time_reference
variables.description: When the story took place (e.g., 'yesterday', 'last week', 'this morning')

variables.name: setting_scene
variables.description: Where and what the person was doing when the story begins

variables.name: initial_event
variables.description: The first unexpected thing that happened

variables.name: initial_assumption
variables.description: What the storyteller first thought was happening

variables.name: plot_development
variables.description: How the situation developed or escalated

variables.name: major_twist
variables.description: The big twist or revelation in the story

variables.name: revelation
variables.description: The final surprising detail or outcome

variables.name: moral_or_lesson
variables.description: Takeaway or lesson from the experience
variables.defaultValue: Sometimes life surprises you in the best ways

hooks.text: You won't believe what happened to me {time_reference}
Just when I thought things couldn't get {emotion_escalation}
Have you ever experienced something like this? Drop your stories below!
